attributes.action: refrain from any military action against the state of Iran except with the full support of the United Nations and our fellow members of the EU
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The United States administration seems to be moving inexorably towards military action against Iran. They are unlikely to do this unilaterally and will expect UK support in repeating the mistakes of the action against Iraq. If we make support for action conditional on the support of the EU and the UN, it will mitigate against hawkish US tendencies.
